repos_data.description: QloApps is a Free and Open-source hotel management and reservation system to take a hotel business online. QloApps offers a Property Management System (PMS), a Booking Engine, and an attractive Hotel Website. Elevate hotel operations with QloApps to streamline processes and provide an enhanced experience for both hoteliers and guests.
Desk sharing, room reservation, free seating, and co-working for enterprises
